text: the best muffins are really just
miniature cakes so I say with a richer
the better muffins themselves are
seasonless but we have such great summer
berries available
might as well fold some of them into the
batter first thing I'm going to do is
mix together a little crumb topping
because you know crumb topping is two
muffins what icing is two cupcakes so
I've got my flour and then I'm gonna use
a combination of white sugar and dark
brown sugar a little bit of cinnamon and
allspice and then salt you really need
salt to make all the flavors come
together whisk it up and then pour in
melted butter it's a really easy crumb
topping to make I like cooking with my
hands it's just a tactile experience I
get to lick my fingers and that's it
crumb topping really easy and just set
that aside when you make the muffins a
lot of recipes use an oil-based muffin
batter but I'm using a butter based
batter because I want my muffins to be
as close to little crumb cakes as
possible so first thing I'm gonna do is
cream that butter and I'm gonna cream it
with the sugar
once it looks really creamy and you are
looking for basically that the sugar
should no longer be apparent it should
be very smooth now I'm gonna add the
eggs one at a time not only does it
incorporate better you also make sure
that the egg doesn't splash up in your
face very important then scrape down the
sides and then I'm gonna add about sour
cream vanilla and lemon zest it smells
really good it smells like lemon I'm
gonna add the dry ingredients with a
mixer on low just beat until the flour
is incorporated and smooth but don't
take it any further you don't want to
work the glutens here you want a nice
tender crumb and now I'm just gonna mix
in the berries I have got monster
blackberries these are huge so I'm just
gonna break them up a little bit just
kind of smush them lightly and that way
you'll get a berry and everybody very
important you would want to have a berry
less bite would you you can see that the
berry juice is staining the muffins a
little bit but I think it's gonna be all
the tastier for it now you just want to
scoop them into greased muffin tins and
only fill them halfway because you want
to leave plenty of room for the crumbs
because the crumbs are the best part and
then you just want to put the crumb
topping right on the muffins just pick
up some of the toppings sort of squeeze
it together in your hand and then let it
fall and break it up you get bigger
crumbs that way you're like these little
bits of cookie on the top of a muffin
I've been known to steal a crumb or two
from the muffins you know just a few
and when the muffins are all cool can
eat them anytime eat them for breakfast
eat them for dessert and always start
with the crumbs
